mapper.insert: insert into f_board (idx, title, content, userid) values(f_board_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{userid})
insert into f_attach(fullName, idx) values (#{fullName}, f_board_seq.currval)
mapper.update: update f_board set hit = hit+1 where idx=#{idx}
mapper.select: select fullName from f_attach where idx=#{idx} order by regdate desc
mapper.update: update f_board set title=#{title}, content=#{content} where idx=#{idx}
update f_board set show='N' where idx=#{idx}
